str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From agon; a struggle, i.e. anguish.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.
More earnestly. Neuter of the comparative of ektenes; more intently.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Sweat, perspiration. A strengthened form of a primary idos: perspiration.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
As if, as it were, like; with numbers: about. From hos and ei; as if.
A clot, large drop (of blood). Perhaps from trepho; a clot.
Blood, literally, figuratively or specially; by implication, bloodshed, also kindred.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To go down, come down, either from the sky or from higher land, descend. From kata and the base of basis; to descend.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.
